researcher_organization.title: Research Organization
researcher_organization.name: Name
researcher_organization.master_user: You must be master user to update your organization or register new users for the organization. Please contact support if you think you should have master user permissions.

studies.title: Research Projects
studies.name: Name
studies.empty: No research projects have been created yet for your organization.

studyactions.empty: No applications are linked to the project
studyactions.aggregator_apps: Add research application to be used with YOUR account
studyactions.description: After the research project has been validated, you can link applications like plugins and external data processing services to it. These applications must connect to the platform using the credentials of one of the members of the research team with sufficient rights.
studyactions.shareback: Application shares data with participant group(s)

status.study_wrong_status: Not active due to research project status
status.study_no_app_participation: Research project does not allow to join using an application

types.OFFER_P: Onboarding: The application offers project participation upon login/start
types.OFFER_EXTRA_PAGE: Onboarding: The project participation is described on an extra page
types.OFFER_INLINE_AGB: Onboarding: Use the terms of use as project description
types.REQUIRE_P: Project participation is required to use the application
types.AUTOADD_A: Plugin is automatically added on project participation
types.DATALINK: Application shares data to project participants

use_periods.RUNNING: During the execution of the project

studyfields.no_change_warning: This setup cannot be changed anymore after the project has been validated.
studyfields.pseudonymous2: , exported data reveals the pseudonymized identity, year of birth, gender and country. Some researchers, like study nurses, may have access to full personal data.
studyfields.pseudonymous2b: , exported data reveals the pseudonymized identity. Some researchers, like study nurses, may have access to full personal data.
studyfields.anonymous2: , the pseudonymization mapping may not be accessed.
studyfields.not_anonymous2: , requests member to share full name, date of birth and contact Information (address, phone, email)
studyfields.assistance2: - the account holder needs assistance of a health professional.
studyfields.groups_empty: No groups of participants have been defined yet.

confirm.validation: Setup cannot be changed anymore. Validation process will be started.
confirm.end_participant_search: No additional users will be able to participate anymore.
confirm.finish_execution: All project data will be frozen at this moment.
confirm.delete: The research project will be completely wiped from the platform.
confirm.abort: All project data will be frozen at this moment. This project will be marked as failed.
confirm.clone: This will clone the project's settings into a new research project. The workflow of the new project will be reset. No participants will be transferred to the new project. This project will remain unchanged.
confirm.are_you_sure: This operation cannot be undone. Are you sure?

studyparticipants.name: Name
studyparticipants.only_first_shown: Only the first 1000 matching consents are shown.
studyparticipants.empty: This research project does not have any participants matching your search criteria yet.
studyparticipants.acceptall: Accept all requests and assign new participants to participant group
studyparticipants.autojoin2: Accept all participation requests and assign new participants to the selected group as soon as the research application linked to this project connects.
studyparticipants.not_allowed: You are not allowed to view the participant list.

studyrecords.empty: Once data is available it can be downloaded here.
studyrecords.wrongrole: You need to have the 'export' permission to export data!

studyrules.title: Project Rules
studyrules.no_change_warning: This setup cannot be changed anymore after the project has been validated.
studyrules.terms_of_use_hint: If the projects General Terms and Conditions have to be read and accepted by the user, please send the text to a platform administrator. We will upload the text in the correct format and provide you with the ID you need to enter here.

addresearcher.success: A new researcher has been added to your organization.

addparticipant.success: A new participant has been added to your project.

studyteam.defineself: You may change your own rights by readding yourself to the team with different rights. You may only do this as long as you are the only team member. You can't deprive yourself of the right to manage the team.

study_checklist.name: Project name and description defined
study_checklist.name_help: The project name will be shown to participants. The description will be available on the portal and during application login.
study_checklist.teamsetup_help: If more people are involved in carrying out the project, provide all involved persons and their role. As long as you have not added more people, you can change your own role by adding yourself again with another role.
study_checklist.information_help: Public information will help account holders to evaluate if your research is relevant for them.
study_checklist.groups_help: Your project may have one or multiple groups of participants. Please define the list of participant groups.
study_checklist.sharingQuery_help: Your project has to explicitely state which data of the participants it will access. The Data Access Filter cannot be changed after the project has been validated.
study_checklist.dates_help: Start and end date will be shown to the participants. No additional data will flow into the project from the moment the data is frozen.
study_checklist.terms_help: If the projects General Terms and Conditions have to be confirmed online by the participants, please contact a platform administrator.
study_checklist.validation_help: Validation will be done by after it has been requested. The project may no longer be changed after validation has been requested.
study_checklist.validation_passed_help: Please wait until project has been validated.
study_checklist.applications_help: You can link applications like plugins and external data processing services to your project. These may read the participants' data and/or share aggregated data back to the participants. These applications must connect to the platform using the credentials of one of the members of the research team with sufficient rights.
study_checklist.applinked: Application has been linked with project
study_checklist.applinked_help: To link an application to your project, please send the code of your project and the name of the application you want to have linked to an administrator of the platform.
study_checklist.partsearchstart_help: As long as participant search is not started it is not possible to participate to the project. Applications which require project participation may not be used.
study_checklist.executionstart_help: Marks this project as officially started.
study_checklist.acceptedpart: Participants assigned to groups and accepted
study_checklist.acceptedpart_help: New participants must be assigned to a participant group and be accepted or rejected.
study_checklist.partsearchend_help: No new participants may be recruited after participant search has ended.
study_checklist.execend_help: When the project is ended data are immediately frozen. The data stay available for download.
study_checklist.exportdata_help: Export the project data as FHIR JSON Bundle (separate for each participant group).

studyinfo.title: Information
studyinfo.introduction: Give additional information about the research project. You can provide public information, additional instructions and contact information only visible to the participants and information for other researchers and administration. Texts are only meant as additional information and may be edited by you at any time.
studyinfo.introduction2: All information is optional. You should give information only on topics that make sense in your research context.

researcher_sharing.description: Share or unshare records from your account with groups of project participants

codes.intro: Participation codes may be used to recruit participants for the study.
codes.empty: No participation codes have been generated.
